nurd-project.title: TravelingTables
nurd-project.body:
Connecting diners who want to share an authentic home cooked meal. Travelling Table, it's an international focused social media web application. Users will be able to be both a host and a diner. Our applications main goal is to bring people together to experience authentic food.

Tools used,Node.js, Express.js ,JavaScrip,Mysql,Sequelizer, ORM, Handlebars, Bootstrap,jQuery.

https://github.com/ImanGurey/TravelingTables

second-project.title: GifTastic
second-project.body:
Connecting diners who want to share an authentic home cooked meal. Travelling Table, it's an international focused social media web application. Users will be able to be both a host and a diner. Our applications main goal is to bring people together to experience authentic food.

Tools used Node.js, Express.js ,JavaScrip,Mysql,Sequelizer, ORM, Handlebars, Bootstrap,jQuery.

https://github.com/lydiarachel/GifTastic

getthegist-project.title: Get the Gist
getthegist-project.body:
A web application group project that allows mini written blog contributions from real life pros or novices in various aspects of life and business, in order to provide helpful information to users. Guests can have read only access to the written contributions.

Built using ReactJS, Materialize, Node and Express Server, MongoDB and Mongoose, and deployed in Heroku.

https://github.com/lydiarachel/theDahlingsProject

fourth-project.title: Trivia Game
fourth-project.body:
A ThunderCats Trivia Game form with multiple choice options.

JavaScript, HTML, CSS

https://github.com/lydiarachel/TriviaGame

fifth-project.title: Schedule3work Project
fifth-project.body:
Schedule2Work (ver.1.0.0) is an app designed to assist small businesses with storing employee information & scheduling shifts, with an emphasis on features desirable for local fast-food restaurants with part-time employees. The client-facing website was created with React.js, and relies on data stored on a separate server created with Node.js..

React.js, Node.js, MDB React, React Router Dom, MySQLdb, Axios, Bootstrap, CSS, Npm

https://https://github.com/JoeLearns2Code/Schedule2Work

sixth-project.title: Friend Finder
sixth-project.body:
A compatibility-based 'FriendFinder' application -- basically a dating app. This full-stack site will take in results from the users' surveys, then compare their answers with those from other users. The app will then display the name and picture of the user with the best overall match.

JavaScript, Node and Express Servers

https://github.com/ImanGurey/FriendFinder

seventh-project.title: Bamazon
seventh-project.body:
An Amazon-like storefront using MySQL. The app takes in orders from customers and depletes stock from the store's inventory.

Node.JS and MySQL

https://github.com/ImanGurey/Bamazon

eighth-project.title: Clicky Game App
eighth-project.body:
A burger logger with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM (yum!).

MVC design pattern.

https://github.com/lydiarachel/burger
